    • writeDataToPDF

      public void writeDataToPDF(Object data, String[] pages, String fileId)
      Write data from an object to a PDF with matching smart tags. PDF should be preset with instantiation of this class.

      This method assumes that pdf path and output path info has been set on instantiation.

      See test class with same name for example.

      Parameters:
      fileId - : An id, such as demographic number, to identify the file.

    • writeDataToPDF

      public void writeDataToPDF(String pdfPath, String outPath, Object data, String[] pages, String fileId)
      Writes data from an object to a PDF with matching smart tags. PDF should be preset with instantiation of this class.

      See test class with same name for example.

      Parameters:
      pdfPath - : the absolute path to an editable pdf template.
      outPath - : outPut path for completed PDF.

    • getGetterMethods

      public static Map<String,Method> getGetterMethods(Object data)
      For pulling methods out of generic objects. This method will recurse through JPA entity beans returned by a method. The following methods could be pulled out and put into their own utility class.

      Credit: http://www.java2s.com/Code/Java/Reflection/GetsthegettersofapojoasamapofStringaskeyandMethodasvalue.htm

    • invokeValue

      public String invokeValue(String methodName)
      String return values only. This method will return data 2 methods deep from the Method Map and POJO Object set in current Object state. ie: demographic.phoneNumber
      Returns:
